name: Help Us Hope
overview:
When was Help Us Hope formed and why?

Help Us Hope was officially launched in February 2009 and was set up to assist HIV/AIDS burdened community orphans and women with home based health care, psychological support and mostly to promote the reduction of the prevalence of sexually transmitted infections other than HIV/AIDS.

Our Aim Add Value -To empower women with information, skills & self confidence to care for themselves & their vulnerable children

Support Social - To improve the lives of children & women struggling with the impact of the HIV/AIDS pandemic with shelter & nourishment.

Invest - To educate children orphaned by HIV/Aids to mature into emotionally & psychologically stable adults

Care -To form lasting, loving & nurturing relations

The Organization is registered with the South African Directorate of Non Profit Organization. NPO Registration Number 71341
